item.title: Man killed over land dispute in Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: A 35-yr-old man was found murdered on Sunday night at Bommanagunda village in Raichur district. The deceased is identified as Basavaraj Timmayya , a resident of Kalanger Doddi, Bommanagunda, Devadurg taluk. Timmayya stayed in a joint family, and they had purchased a 3-acre agricultural land a few years ago, registered in the Timmayya's paternal uncle's name, who passed away. "After his death, the land was transferred to the uncle's wife, but Timmayya was ploughing the land. This caused ...]]>
item.author: Tnn
